Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.dsformatting

Interface DsFormattingDevice

  • public interface DsFormattingDevice
    An interface representing a Dynamic Signature (DS) device.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getTemplate

        Template getTemplate​(SecureString challenge)
              throws InvalidDigitChecksumException
        Get a DS template from a challenge. If the challenge does not map to a template then the returned template will have the empty list for primitives.
        Parameters:
        challenge - the challenge
        Returns:
        the template, null if no template was encoded in the challenge
        Throws:
        InvalidDigitChecksumException - when a computed check digit does not match the given check digit.

      • getTemplate

        Template getTemplate​(int templateId)
        Get a DS template by id.
        Parameters:
        templateId - the id of the template
        Returns:
        the template, null if no template was found with that id

      • getPrimitive

        <T extends Primitive> T getPrimitive​(String name)
        Get a primitive for the given tag name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the primitive as defined in the JSON configuration file.
        Returns:
        the primitive

      • getCapParameters

        DsCapParameters getCapParameters​(SecureString challenge,
                                 Template.DomainType domain,
                                 DsCapParameters.DsCapMode capMode,
                                 DsTransactionData dsTransactionData)
                          throws InvalidDigitChecksumException
        Get the CAP parameters for the given DS challenge and associated transaction data.
        Parameters:
        challenge - the challenge or null if there is no challenge.
        domain - the template domain. Can only be Template.DomainType.CONNECTED or Template.DomainType.SWYS if challenge is null.
        capMode - the CAP mode to generate input data for
        dsTransactionData - the template transaction data or null if there is no transaction data.
        Returns:
        the CAP input parameters
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the challenge does not correspond to the transaction data (only applies if the challenge is non-null).
        InvalidDigitChecksumException - when a computed check digit does not match the given check digit.

      • getCapParameters

        DsCapParameters getCapParameters​(Template.DomainType domain,
                                 DsCapParameters.DsCapMode capMode,
                                 DsTransactionData dsTransactionData)
                          throws InvalidDigitChecksumException
        Get the CAP parameters for the given DS transaction data.
        Parameters:
        domain - the template domain. Can only be Template.DomainType.CONNECTED or Template.DomainType.SWYS.
        capMode - the CAP mode to generate input data for
        dsTransactionData - the template transaction data or null if there is no transaction data.
        Returns:
        the CAP input parameters
        Throws:
        InvalidDigitChecksumException - when a computed check digit does not match the given check digit.
